title: Unable to connec to server
body: OK so, a few days ago I started getting an error when joining games. "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game." Usually hitting reconnect would work after a few tries. Tonight however it is not working at all. There is no problems with my internet other than League, since I am on the same connection right now, and youtube works, and my brother is playing WoW.

replies.body: OK tried everything on that guide again... now its not letting me change skins/masteries after locking in a champion or letting me connect to games.
Ive tried all that and it seems to help temporarily (2-3 games) before it starts again.

Your network seems to be having issues connecting specifically to our game servers, and resulting in these errors.  You'll want to go over the steps available in the the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
